product info
format:
<template>
    <v-btn class="inspectMUTC" @click="send({payload:true})" color="white" density="default" append-icon="mdi-code-braces"> Inspect </v-btn>
</template>

<style>
.inspectMUTC{
    top: -96px !important;
    left: -303px !important;
    width: 142px !important;
}
</style>

name: getTemUnit
func:
let unit = {
    groups: 
    { 
            hide: ["ncd-uptime:Inspect1",
                "ncd-uptime:Inspect2",
                "ncd-uptime:Inspect3"],
            show:["ncd-uptime:group1",
                "ncd-uptime:group2",
                "ncd-uptime:group3",
                "ncd-uptime:group4",
                "ncd-uptime:group5",
                "ncd-uptime:group6",
                "ncd-uptime:group7",
                "ncd-uptime:group8",
                "ncd-uptime:group9",
                "ncd-uptime:group10",
                "ncd-uptime:group11",
                "ncd-uptime:group12",
                "ncd-uptime:Current History",
                "ncd-uptime:Battery Level History"]
    } 
}
msg.payload = unit;
return msg;
